name: Ruby Interpreter
description: Ruby is a dynamic, open source programming language with a focus on simplicity and productivity. It has an elegant syntax that is natural to read and easy to write. Ruby can be used to write anything from simple scripts to complex web applications. It supports multiple programming paradigms, including procedural, object-oriented, and functional programming. Ruby also features a dynamic type system and automatic memory management. It is commonly used for web development, automation, data analysis, and prototyping.
